title: New: Young Magic – Night In The Ocean (S.Maharba Serpent Love Song Remix)
body:
Having impressed last year with a fantastic string of remixes, **S.**

**Maharba** is back, this time toying with a track from one of the albums of the year so far. Adding his stereotypically expansive sound and synth inspired drawl, **S.Maharba** leaves the vocals relatively intact, yet thrashes the rest of the track into a gloriously, almost unrecognizable mess. With more original material on the way, 2012 is shaping up rather nicely for the producer.

Check out **S.Maharba’s** _Night In The Ocean (S.Maharba Serpent Love Song Remix)_ below, and grab a listen of **Young Magic’s** debut album **_Melt_** which comes out tomorrow.
